title: Party Shaker
summary: Shake the device so the colors change. Tap the screen to choose different colors
description: When you go to parties, celebrations or concerts this app will make you shine in the crowd. Ir is totally free. No ad no in-app purchase. This version also include wear watch version. So your watch will change color when you shake.
descriptionHTML: When you go to parties, celebrations or concerts this app will make you shine in the crowd. Ir is totally free. No ad no in-app purchase. This version also include wear watch version. So your watch will change color when you shake.
